entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Images aren't reloading correctly in CollectionView #10435
  • Live Visual Tree is missing "Defined in..." arrow for objects #10434
  • Make RegisterRoute a default #10429
  • Auto add using as global #10428
  • Moving the cursor in an Entry field causes crash in iOS 16 #10427
  • .NET 7.0 Button Background Color doesn't update when IsEnabled is changed on Android 7.1.2 #10426
  • .Net Maui can't retrieve embedded resource from assembly with ImageSource.FromResource. (IOS) #10416
  • Line coordinates are not respected #10415
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Animations.Animation doesn't work. #10412
    Backlog

Closed

  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load assembly 'Microsoft.Maui, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken='. #9730
  • Not able to deploy MAUI app to physical iPhone using VS 17.3.5 w/ MAUI 6.0.536 #10422
  • Catalyst Gallery no longer resizes to fit the window #10183
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Resizetizer cannot find existing images #10380
  • Native Android Application doesn't find resources inside a library referenced through nuget package #10419
  • VS 17.4 Preview 2.1 - System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added. #10408
  • Selecting all the text on a entry for iOS causes crash #10228
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Border StrokeShape Style Setter does not set #10229
    Backlog
  • Picker Items not showing when BindingContext is changed from null to value at runtime #10258
  • Switching MainPage does not work if it is a NavigationPage (similar to #2517) #10271
  • [iOS] Editor.IsEnabled doesn't do anything #6700
    7.0-rc2
  • Maui Blazor No Hot Reload. #10367
  • [CustomControl] HotReload works for nested items that derive from Element but not for items that derive from VisualElement #10390

PullRequests

Created

  • Add min width/height to template styles of select controls #10425
    area/a11y
  • Remove unused and potentially conflicting feeds #10423
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix top-left aligned shapes issue #10417
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10413
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview

Merged

  • Update MAUI for .NET 6 version #10424
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Ensure that star rows and columns cannot exceed the available space #10409
    area/layout 🔲
  • Update the diff tool #10421
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Try reduce the ABI breaks #10410
    7.0-rc2
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Font inline docs #10014
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10118
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10358
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0
  • Bumps for 7.0.0-rc2 #10290
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecesary parent) #9840
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, high
  • [Windows] Map the Window title to the automation name property #10159
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • Force DisableFastUpToDateCheck=false for MAUI repo build #9083
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Tizen] Use Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia.Views.SkiaGraphicsView #10359
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨
